column5: I thought I heard them say on the radio today that admission to the show is $5.00 after 5:00pm, but I wasn't really paying attention so I may be mistaken. I was wondering if anyone here cold confirm this? I would like to take the kids and that is a pretty good deal if it is actually true.
Can't confirm as I am stuck in Ottawa and only get 640 every once in a while, but every year they have a really good price after $5, so you probably heard right.
You heard correct! Sponsored by Rapala, $5 after 5!
Glad you mentioned the $5 after 5pm.  Nothing about it on the website.  Only open till 8pm.  6pm on Sunday
Thanks for the confirmation, and your right it isn't on the website. The kids are usually tired after about 2 hours of it anyway so the $5.00 deal is perfect.
